description: Banner displayed after items are moved successfully. 'All' here is the name of the default view in the workspace, which is localized under the id projectsComponent.allItems
defaultMessage: {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} moved from Trash to 'All'

description: Banner displayed after items are moved successfully. 'All' here is the name of the default view in the workspace, which is localized under the id projectsComponent.allItems
defaultMessage: {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} moved from Spam to 'All'

description: Message that appears when one or more items have been selected and moved to the trash.
defaultMessage: {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} moved to Trash.

description: Message that appears when one or more items have been selected and moved to spam.
defaultMessage: {count, plural, one {# item} other {# items}} moved to Spam.

description: Tooltip message for button that restores items from Trash. 'All' here is the name of the default view in the workspace, which is localized under the id projectsComponent.allItems
defaultMessage: Restore selected items and move them to 'All'

description: Label for button that removes one or more items from Trash and puts it back in the normal workspace
Tooltip message for button that marks items as not spam. 'All' here is the name of the default view in the workspace, which is localized under the id projectsComponent.allItems
defaultMessage: Mark selected items as not spam and move them to 'All'

description: Label for button that removes one or more items from Spam and puts them back in the normal workspace
Label for button that sends one or more items to Spam
Label for button that sends one or more items to Trash
